languages.text: "По многочисленным трупам врагов, умывшись их кровью и слезами". {n}Маражай хищно облизывается.{/n} "Не лги себе, считая, что мы покинем это место живьем без насилия. И я надеюсь, что на нашем пути его будет много".

traits.locale_text: "По многочисленным трупам врагов, умывшись их кровью и слезами". {n}Маражай хищно облизывается.{/n} "Не лги себе, считая, что мы покинем это место живьем без насилия. И я надеюсь, что на нашем пути его будет много".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."
languages.original_text: "По многочисленным трупам врагов, умывшись их кровью и слезами". {n}Маражай хищно облизывается.{/n} "Не лги себе, считая, что мы покинем это место живьем без насилия. И я надеюсь, что на нашем пути его будет много".

traits.locale_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Sobre una montaña de cadáveres, bañándonos en las lágrimas y la sangre de nuestros enemigos». {n}Marazhai se relame.{/n} «No te engañes pensando que podemos escapar de aquí sin violencia. Por mi parte, espero que la haya en abundancia».
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre una montaña de cadáveres, bañándonos en las lágrimas y la sangre de nuestros enemigos». {n}Marazhai se relame.{/n} «No te engañes pensando que podemos escapar de aquí sin violencia. Por mi parte, espero que la haya en abundancia».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “爬上尸山血海，沐浴在敌人的眼泪与鲜血中。”{n}玛拉斋舔了舔嘴唇。{/n}“不要自欺欺人，别以为不通过暴力手段就能活着逃出这个地方。至于我，我想让这里血流成河。”
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: “爬上尸山血海，沐浴在敌人的眼泪与鲜血中。”{n}玛拉斋舔了舔嘴唇。{/n}“不要自欺欺人，别以为不通过暴力手段就能活着逃出这个地方。至于我，我想让这里血流成河。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「死体の山の上で、敵の涙と血に浸かろうじゃないか」{n}マラズハイは唇をなめる。{/n}「暴力を使うことなく生きてこの地から逃げられるなどと考えるな。俺は暴力を、いくらでも歓迎しているのだから」
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: 「死体の山の上で、敵の涙と血に浸かろうじゃないか」{n}マラズハイは唇をなめる。{/n}「暴力を使うことなく生きてこの地から逃げられるなどと考えるな。俺は暴力を、いくらでも歓迎しているのだから」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « En passant sur le corps de nos ennemis et en pataugeant allègrement dans leurs larmes et leur sang. {n}Marazhai se passe la langue sur les lèvres.{/n} Ne vous faites pas d'illusion, la violence est notre seule échappatoire. Et pour ma part, je compte bien m'en donner à cœur joie. »
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: « En passant sur le corps de nos ennemis et en pataugeant allègrement dans leurs larmes et leur sang. {n}Marazhai se passe la langue sur les lèvres.{/n} Ne vous faites pas d'illusion, la violence est notre seule échappatoire. Et pour ma part, je compte bien m'en donner à cœur joie. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Auf einem Berg von Leichen, in den Tränen und dem Blut unserer Feinde badend." {n}Marazhai leckt sich die Lippen.{/n} "Glaubt bloß nicht, wir würden ohne Gewalt lebend hier entkommen können. Ich für meinen Teil hoffe, dass es reichlich Gewalt geben wird."
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: "Auf einem Berg von Leichen, in den Tränen und dem Blut unserer Feinde badend." {n}Marazhai leckt sich die Lippen.{/n} "Glaubt bloß nicht, wir würden ohne Gewalt lebend hier entkommen können. Ich für meinen Teil hoffe, dass es reichlich Gewalt geben wird."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

languages.text: "Cesetlere basa basa, düşmanlarımızın kan ve gözyaşlarını tada tada." {n}Marazhai dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Buradan sessiz sedasız kaçacağız diye kendini kandırayım deme. Şahsen ben, vahşete doyacağımızı umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "On a mountain of bodies, bathing in our enemies' tears and blood." {n}Marazhai licks his lips.{/n} "Do not deceive yourself by thinking we will escape this place alive without violence. I, for one, hope that there will be plenty of it."

traits.locale_text: "Cesetlere basa basa. Düşmanlarımızın kan ve gözyaşları altında." {n}Marazhai dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Buradan sessiz sedasız kaçacağız, diye kendini kandırayım deme. Şahsen ben, vahşete doyacağımızı umuyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
